description: Featuring an homage to one of the most industrious animals, the Sawtooth Crew could send you several ways: get busy like a beaver, or kick back in the den. Whether you're inspired to shovel the driveway, or just gnaw your way through lunch, the odor-blocking, moisture-wicking power of merino wool makes these socks so dam good you're covered on both fronts.
name: Darn Tough Socks Sawtooth Crew Lightweight Cushion Socks - Mens
